artist: Engraver: H. Meyer; Painter: After Correggio (Antonio Allegri); Publisher: Charles Knight
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

in plate in black: [Engraved by H Meyer/ CORREGGIO/ After a head by himself in the Cathedral of Parma/ London Published by Charles Knight &Co. Ludgate Street]; in pencil at bottom of sheet: [1-301]
life_date: H. Meyer, Engraver; After Correggio (Antonio Allegri), Painter, Italian, 1489/94–1534; Charles Knight, Publisher, English, 1743–c.1826
title: Portrait of Correggio
